update TPAM_IBANK_TXN_INFO
PAGY_PAY_TXN_TM = #{pagyPayTxnTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PAGY_TXN_SSN = #{pagyTxnSsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAGY_TXN_TM = #{pagyTxnTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORIG_PAGY_PAY_TXN_SSN = #{origPagyPayTxnSsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIG_PAGY_PAY_TXN_TM = #{origPagyPayTxnTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PAGY_SYS_NO = #{pagySysNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAGY_SYS_SOA_NO = #{pagySysSoaNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAGY_SYS_SOA_VERSION = #{pagySysSoaVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAGY_SYS_SOA_ACTION_FLAG = #{pagySysSoaActionFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAGY_NO = #{pagyNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAGY_MCHT_NO = #{pagyMchtNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

TPAM_ACCT_OUT_SUB_TYPE_NO = #{tpamAcctOutSubTypeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPAM_CARD_OUT_TYPE_NO = #{tpamCardOutTypeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

TPAM_ACCT_OUT_TOKEN_BIND_ID = #{tpamAcctOutTokenBindId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPAM_ACCT_IN_TYPE_NO = #{tpamAcctInTypeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPAM_ACCT_IN_SUB_TYPE_NO = #{tpamAcctInSubTypeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPAM_CARD_IN_TYPE_NO = #{tpamCardInTypeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPAM_ACCT_IN_NO = #{tpamAcctInNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPAM_ACCT_IN_CUSTOMER_INFO = #{tpamAcctInCustomerInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPAM_ACCT_IN_TOKEN_BIND_ID = #{tpamAcctInTokenBindId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPAM_TER_TYPE = #{tpamTerType,jdbcType=CHAR},
TPAM_BR_NO = #{tpamBrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPAM_TELLER_NO = #{tpamTellerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPAM_QUOTA_NO = #{tpamQuotaNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPAM_OPTION = #{tpamOption,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPAM_FUNC_CTRL_FLAG = #{tpamFuncCtrlFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPMA_MS_IND = #{tpmaMsInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
TPAM_CASH_TRAN_LND = #{tpamCashTranLnd,jdbcType=CHAR},
TPAM_CNT_PTY_MS_LND = #{tpamCntPtyMsLnd,jdbcType=CHAR},
TPAM_CNT_PTY_CASH_FLAG = #{tpamCntPtyCashFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
TPAM_TXN_AMT = #{tpamTxnAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAGY_BACKEND_URL = #{pagyBackendUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPAM_STLM_DT = #{tpamStlmDt,jdbcType=CHAR},
TPAM_STLM_TM = #{tpamStlmTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPAM_STLM_AMT = #{tpamStlmAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPAM_SETTLEMENT_FLAG = #{tpamSettlementFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPAM_SETTLE_FEE = #{tpamSettleFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

TPAM_RESP_CODE = #{tpamRespCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TPAM_RESP_MSG = #{tpamRespMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PAGY_RESP_CODE = #{pagyRespCode,jdbcType=CHAR},

UPD_LOCALHOST_IP = #{updLocalhostIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PAGY_CRT_TM = #{pagyCrtTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PAGY_UP_TM = sysdate
where PAGY_PAY_TXN_SSN = #{pagyPayTxnSsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TPAM_IBANK_TXN_INFO set PAGY_PAY_TXN_TM = #{pagyPayTxnTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PAGY_TXN_SSN = #{pagyTxnSsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAGY_TXN_TM = #{pagyTxnTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORIG_PAGY_PAY_TXN_SSN = #{origPagyPayTxnSsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIG_PAGY_PAY_TXN_TM = #{origPagyPayTxnTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PAGY_SYS_NO = #{pagySysNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, PAGY_SYS_SOA_NO = #{pagySysSoaNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, = #{tpamCashTranLnd,jdbcType=CHAR}, TPAM_CNT_PTY_MS_LND = #{tpamCntPtyMsLnd,jdbcType=CHAR}, TPAM_CNT_PTY_CASH_FLAG = #{tpamCntPtyCashFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, TPAM_TXN_AMT = #{tpamTxnAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAGY_BACKEND_URL = #{pagyBackendUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TPAM_STLM_DT = #{tpamStlmDt,jdbcType=CHAR}, TPAM_STLM_TM = #{tpamStlmTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TPAM_STLM_AMT = #{tpamStlmAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAGY_CRT_TM = #{pagyCrtTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PAGY_UP_TM = sysdate where PAGY_PAY_TXN_SSN = #{pagyPayTxnSsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select a.*,b.TXN_REQ_SSN,b.TXN_REQ_TM,b.ORIG_TXN_REQ_SSN,b.ORIG_TXN_REQ_TM,b.PROD_ID,b.TXN_TYPE from TPAM_IBANK_TXN_INFO a left join PAGY_TXN_INFO b on a.pagy_txn_ssn=b.pagy_txn_ssn where substr(a.TPAM_TXN_TM,0,8) = #{settleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and a.PAGY_RESP_CODE in ('0000','0002') AND a.PAGY_TXN_SSN NOT LIKE 'R%' AND a.PAGY_SYS_SOA_ACTION_FLAG <> '98'
